content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed we begin with Gang Busters. From December 11, 1948, we’ll hear The Case Of The Thornberry Brothers.

(24:30) Our second story is The Case Of The Purloined Corpse, from The Adventures Of Michael Shayne. That episode originally aired October 9, 1948.

Download CaseClosed755 

Case Closed is made possible through the support of its listeners. If you enjoy this program every week and would like to help support it, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you to all who’ve helped out over the last 14 years!
